data.title: Kroonstad. Imperial Map of South Africa. Compiled For Field Intelligence Department. by WOOD & ORTLEPP:
data.meta_description: Cape Town, Wood & Ortlepp, Argus & Co. Lithographers, March 1900 - Folding Map. Cloth covered thin cover approx 7 x 4 inches. Black lettering to front and spine. Fold-out canvas backed map, total size 24 x 19.5 inches. In very good condition. Cloth cover faded with some handling marks, minor rubbing to corners, small nick to cloth at bottom of spine. Some mild foxing spots to canvas backing. Three foxing spots to bottom corner, with faint impressions above. Some minor tanning and minor handling marks. Else map overall bright and clean. No tears or holes. Lithograph map with roads and rivers in colour. - Kroonstad. Imperial Map of South Africa. Compiled For Field Intelligence Department.
data.text:
Terms of Sale:

All overseas orders must be paid in

advance either by credit card (we accept Visa, Mastercard, Switch, paypal) or by

cheque / money order in Pound Sterling. Postage, insurance and packing is extra.

Books can be returned within 14 days upon receipt (please let us straight away).

If the book was wrongly described, we will refund your return postage. If you

just changed your mind, we would you expect you to refund our postage to you. We

try to give as careful a description as possible, but we do no...

More Information

Shipping Terms:

Shipping costs are based on books weighing 2.2 LB, or 1 KG. If your book order is heavy or oversized, we may contact you to let you know extra shipping is required.
